issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] Error with CAST: Unsupported SQL type Time
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
> select cast(timestamp as Time) from foo limit 5;
NotImplemented("Unsupported SQL type Time")

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12232?focusedCommentId=17321316) by Evan Chan (velvia):*
After discussion for the above PR, seems like the above PR does not really solve this issue, and thus will be amended or left.  A related bug/feature will be filed instead.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12232?focusedCommentId=17332400) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/193
